DataElement.preferredName: Plan Until Repeat Activity Rule Cessation Delay Quantity Range ISO21090.URG.PQ.TIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A quantity of time falling within minimum and maximum bounds that specifies the elapsed time after the observed result occurs and before the cessation of repeating the activity. EXAMPLE(S): Stop 20 days after the observed event occurs.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Plan Until Repeat Activity Rule Cessation Delay Quantity Range
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: To devise, contrive, or formed in design.:Up to the point of some specific time or event.:Make or do or perform again.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.:A prescribed guide for conduct or action._A stopping.:Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.:How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: To devise, contrive, or formed in design.:Up to the point of some specific time or event.:Make or do or perform again.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.:A prescribed guide for conduct or action.

Concepts.definition: To devise, contrive, or form in design.
Up to the point of some specific time or event.
Make or do or perform again.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.
A prescribed guide for conduct or action.

Property.preferredDefinition: A stopping.:Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.:How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.:The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.

Concepts.definition: Time during which some action is awaited; inactivity resulting in something being put off until a later time; the state of being slower or later.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains URG so that the values are PQ.TIME.
